visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: 'Fruit Sales', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark gray color (#333) for axis labels and titles, with a font size of 14px. Data series: Series 1 - 'Sales 2022' with data [1, 4, 3, 5], Series 2 - 'Sales 2023' with data [null, 14, 13, 15], Series 3 - 'Special Event' with data [15] and scatter type. Custom colors: Use ['#7cb5ec', '#434348', '#90ed7d'] for the series. Additional configurations: Set chart margins to [50, 50, 100, 80], background color to light gray (#f0f0f0), and show legend with a dark gray background.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration is designed to render a spline chart titled 'Fruit Sales'. The chart includes three data series: 'Sales 2022' and 'Sales 2023' as spline series, and 'Special Event' as a scatter series. The x-axis categories represent different fruits, and the y-axis represents sales. The styling includes dark gray (#333) for axis labels and titles with a font size of 14px. The series are colored using custom colors ['#7cb5ec', '#434348', '#90ed7d']. The chart has specific margins and a light gray background. The legend is included with a dark gray background. Additional text and labels are rendered along the series paths using the Highcharts renderer, enhancing the visual narrative of the data.
